meanings.definition: The process of producing steroids in the body.
meanings.sent1: Steroidogeneses are essential for maintaining hormone balance.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study steroidogeneses to understand how our bodies create hormones.
meanings.sent3: The biology class giggled when the teacher mentioned steroidogeneses.
meanings.sent4: In the factory of the body, steroidogeneses are the hardworking laborers producing essential hormones.
meanings.sent5: The intricate dance of steroidogeneses ensures our bodies function properly.

meanings.sent1: Understanding steroidogeneses helps in developing medications.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes abuse substances that enhance steroidogeneses.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the secret ingredient in the dish was steroidogeneses.
meanings.sent4: In the laboratory of the body, steroidogeneses work tirelessly to create necessary compounds.
meanings.sent5: The magic of steroidogeneses lies in their ability to transform simple molecules into powerful hormones.
